name: BS Marvelous: Camp Arnold Course: Dai-1-shuu
overview: BS Marvelous: Camp Arnold is a Downloadable 4-part Soundlink game for the Satellaview that ran between November 3, 1996 and November 29, 1996. The game was broadcast as a rerun in January, 1997. BS Marvelous: Camp Arnold served as a sequel to the earlier-broadcast BS Marvelous: Time Athletics, released in January 1996, and a direct prequel to Marvelous: Mohitotsu no Takarajima which was not broadcast via Satellaview but instead released in hard copy as a SFC cartridge in October 1996.
